pr_title: Make the reactive SQL clients tests more future proof

timeline.message:
Fix reactive-pg-client deployment tests

They were always skipped even with the -Dtest-postgresql profile and
things were a bit messy regarding the connection URL.

Make it possible to connect to MariaDB in the reactive client tests

This make them symmetrical with the PostgreSQL ones and also allows to
add proper tests really connecting to a MariaDB server.

timeline.bodyText:
out of curiosity, why do we need 2 reactive-postgres.url properties with different values in the pom?

vertx-reactive:postgresql:///hibernate_orm_test
vertx-reactive:postgresql://:5431/hibernate_orm_test
timeline.author: vsevel

replies.bodyText:
The first one is when Docker is not used: we use the default port of the global instance.
The second one is for Docker as we put it on another port.
replies.author: gsmet
